articles.description: Argentina and Inter Miami forward Lionel Messi beats Erling Haaland to win the Ballon d'Or for an eighth time.
articles.title: Messi wins Men's Ballon d'Or for eighth time

articles.description: Spain and Barcelona midfielder Aitana Bonmati wins the Ballon d'Or Feminin for the first time after international and club success.
articles.title: Spain's Bonmati wins Ballon d'Or Feminin for first time

articles.description: Eddie Jones steps down from his position as head coach of Australia, who went out in the pool stage of this year's Rugby World Cup.
articles.title: Jones resigns from role as Australia head coach

articles.description: England and Real Madrid midfielder Jude Bellingham wins the Kopa Trophy for the world's best player aged under 21.
articles.title: Bellingham wins world's best young player award

articles.description: Grady Diangana and Brandon Thomas-Asante get the goals as West Bromwich Albion win the Midlands derby with Coventry City.
articles.title: Corberan's Baggies ease to derby win at Coventry

articles.description: BBC Sport profiles Barcelona and Sweden forward Fridolina Rolfo, one of five nominees for the BBC Women's Footballer of the Year 2023 award.
articles.title: Is Rolfo your Women's Footballer of the Year?

articles.description: The stigma around neck guards in ice hockey "needs to change" following the death of Nottingham Panthers' Adam Johnson, says GB's Abbie Culshaw.
articles.title: Stigma around neck guards 'needs to change'

articles.description: David Beckham presents the 2023 Ballon d'Or and says he "owes Sir Bobby Charlton everything" for his football career.
articles.title: I owe Sir Bobby Charlton everything - Beckham

articles.description: Afghanistan keep their World Cup semi-final dream alive with a comfortable seven-wicket win over Sri Lanka.
articles.title: Afghanistan beat Sri Lanka to stay in top-four race

articles.description: Ralf Rangnick's appointment at Manchester United is largely regarded as a mistake - but was his diagnosis right all along?
articles.title: Problems facing Ten Hag - and was Rangnick right about Man Utd?
